data.eml:eml: Microcambeva ribeirae sp. n. (Teleostei: Siluriformes: Trichomycteridae): a new sarcoglanidine catfish from the Rio Ribeira do Iguape basin, southeastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Costa, Wilson J. E. M., Lima, Sérgio M. Q., Bizer-, Carlos Roberto S. F., Ril (2004): Microcambeva ribeirae sp. n. (Teleostei: Siluriformes: Trichomycteridae): a new sarcoglanidine catfish from the Rio Ribeira do Iguape basin, southeastern Brazil. Zootaxa 563: 1-10, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157605
